metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000344 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In the Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier the DHIES implementation allowed the use of ECB mode. This mode is regarded as unsafe and support for it has been removed from the provider.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1000344` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbcjmail-java - 1.60-1
libbcmail-java - 1.60-1
libbcpg-java - 1.60-1
libbcpkix-java - 1.60-1
libbcprov-java - 1.60-1
libbctls-java - 1.60-1
libbcutil-java - 1.60-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is an intrusive change to introduce to Ubuntu 14.04 LTS. Marking as ignored.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.60-1').
